classic_robot.name: Classic Robot

classic_robot.characteristics: Monotone delivery with synthetic formant resonances

dectalk.description: Stephen Hawking-inspired synthesis with deep robotic tone
dectalk.characteristics: Deep, slow computer voice with distinctive formant synthesis

sbaitso.characteristics: Fast, buzzy retro computer voice with quantized prosody

hal9000.description: Deep, slow computer voice with ominous undertones
hal9000.characteristics: Slow, deliberate speech with deep resonant tones

c3po.description: Protocol droid characteristics with higher pitch
c3po.characteristics: Higher pitched robotic voice with precise articulation

vintage_computer.description: 1980s home computer TTS with authentic retro sound
vintage_computer.characteristics: Authentic 8-bit computer voice with digital artifacts

modern_ai.name: Modern AI
